title: Sessions Promises Backlash Against Sanctuary Cities (Audio)
itunes:title: Sessions Promises Backlash Against Sanctuary Cities (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- David Rivkin, a partner at Baker Hostetler, and Leon Fresco, partner at Holland and Knight and Deputy Assistant Attorney General for the Office of Immigration Litigation at the U.S. Department of Justice Civil Division, dsicuss attorney General Jeff Sessions announcements on Monday regarding sanctuary cities. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
